channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alleged leader of Tren de Aragua, labeled as a terrorist group, charged in New York but on the lam
item.description: An alleged leader of the Tren de Aragua gang labeled by the United States as a terrorist organization has been charged in a New York federal court wit...

item.title: Five new defendants have been charged in connection with a Minnesota housing services fraud scheme
item.description: Five new defendants have been charged in connection with a Minnesota housing services fraud scheme

item.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
item.description: Americans are disconnected from each other at historic levels, buffeted by what a former surgeon general calls an “epidemic of loneliness.”

item.title: Arizona jury sentences man to death in string of killings in metro Phoenix during 2017
item.description: A jury has sentenced a man to death in six murders in metro Phoenix in 2017, but was undecided on the punishment for his convictions in the killings o...

item.title: Hurricane-force wind downs power lines, fans wildfires in Colorado with more on way
